resources.string: C– 25– 09 VILLAWANGSAMAS CONDO\nWANGSAM MAJU - KUALA LUMPUR

A forward-thinking developer offering more than 3 years of experience in building, integrating, testing and supporting Android applications for mobile and tablet devices on the Android platform with benefit of Industrial engineering experiences. I am always looking to achieve client satisfaction to earn long term business.
Created 6+ fully functional applications for Android devices
Experienced in PHP in order to creating databases and APIs related to applications
Extensive expertise in applying industrial engineering methods for the management and control of android development projects
Known for writing efficient, maintainable and reusable code
Proficient in design, data structures, problem-solving, and debugging
Expert in the interaction between various devices and versions of Android
cooperating remotely with Rodex Co. in CyrclesPay project as an android developer.
CyrclesPay is an application for Payments and financial transactions.
utilization of Dev.Azure for remote project management.
provided startup idea, business planning, UI/UX designing, android coding, Server-side scripting in PHP, database designing and structuring in MySQL.
startup to invite and manage guests in special occasions and ceremonies.

includes a variety of applications (inviting guests, guest management and system management), utilization of MVVM architecture, using a variety of libraries such as retrofit2, capable of creating and reading QRcodes, utilization of visual charts, using various animations in UI to deliver a simple user-friendly UI/UX.
cooperating with Arman Negaran Fanavar Pars Co. in Anypal project led by android development team.
Anypal is a startup application for introducing businesses and making secure payment systems.

developed application for Tadbir Garan Novin Fars Co. including UI/UX designing, android coding, Server-side scripting in PHP, database designing related to the project in MySQL.
